snippet.title: The Battle of Angels - Game Trailer
snippet.description:
THE BATTLE OF ANGELS - Video Game Trailer ---  You are an Angel called by God.
Your mission is to transform a city ghetto into a lovely looking paradise,
But, how can you make this happen, you ask?

You must confront the existing spirit power there and defeat him.
Presently, he owns much in this city, including drug cartels, cocaine lords, the mafia and more. You must defeat your opponent who controls these city structures inside the boxing ring at the Roman Colosseum.

Capture the enemy buildings and gain additional fight moves by winning boxing matches. As you start to win, it will be noticed that the graffiti and trash in the city will start to disappear. Your enemy will also start to acknowledge you are winning and therefore speed up his attacks on you in the arena.

Eventually, the hard core crimes happening in the city will start to be lesser in tone and spectrum. Instead of violent acts happening, then the events taking place will begin to be non-violent.

After clicking on an icon, then watching an event taking place.  The Angel will then say his idea for that event's ending. The demon angel, in contrast, will then answer his idea for that same event ending. The winner of the forthcoming boxing fight will determine that scenario's ending.

Which one will win?  Are You up to the task?  Save your people in the city!  PLAY THE GAME.  NOW !!!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1286210/The_Battle_of_Angels/
